basics.name: Kristyn Mimura
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I'm currently studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I'm expecting to graduate in Spring, 2024. I'm currently studying to enter the software engineering field.

work.name: University of Hawaii
work.summary: Work remotely with a team of primarily students to work on web-facing Java projects that benefit the University of Hawaii community
highlights: Use JIRA, Kanban, and Github to manage team workflow

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

volunteer.summary: Organize weekly social, educational and spiritual oriented events for youth

awards.title: University of Hawaii at Manoa Provost Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarship of $10,000 for four years awarded to incoming freshmen students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.8 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Mamoru & Aiko Takitani Scholarship
awards.awarder: The Mamoru and Aiko Takitani Foundation
awards.summary: A scholarship awarded to an outstanding graduating senior selected by each qualifying high school to receive $3,000

awards.title: Community Scholarship Fund
awards.summary: A scholarship of $2,625 given to residents of Hawaii to help them in their academic careers

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Undergraduate students are awarded the Dean's List distinction if they: (1) earn a semester grade point average of 3.5 or higher based on 12 credits or more taken for a grade (C/NC courses do not count), and (2) do not receive grades of W, I, F, or NC for that semester.
